name: Angelo's little Adventure
description:
Angelo is an angel in education. Now he has to complete a final test to finally get his wings and finish his education. He is sent to the town of Eversville to help the local stamp collector Herman.

"Angelo's little Adventure" is a small game for the Game Boy made with GB Studio.  You play as Angelo and try to find a way to help Herman with his problem. The real issue might not be as obvious as you think, so look out!

To play this game, you can either use the Web version on this site or you can download the ROM and play it on a Game Boy emulator or flashcartridge.
